snippet:
This place always have a nice atmosphere, however ever since they implemented the machine self ordering system, they're taking things a little too slowly.

Some old customers requested to order manually through the counter but was refused and asked to order through the machine, this is not so good of an attitude. The orders were prepared rather slowly even though there were only two orders today when we went here.

They chose to implement the system but did not carry it through completely because they did not show our order number at "Ready for pickup" but just at "preparing order" and expected us to just show up at the counter when they put the food there.

The chicken is pretty fresh though and the food is good.
explanation: The review provides a balanced opinion, mentioning both positive (atmosphere and food quality) and negative aspects (slow service and poor implementation of the self-ordering system). The tone is constructive and specific.
raw: Review 3: Genuine-Negative|95|The review provides a balanced opinion, mentioning both positive (atmosphere and food quality) and negative aspects (slow service and poor implementation of the self-ordering system). The tone is constructive and specific.
